name: Pullem
description:
A small arcade style puzzle game where you want to align yourself with tiles in order to pull them towards you and score points.

Points:

Pair: 30
2 Pairs: 150
Triple: 200
Quads: 400
One of every kind: 750

2 minute time limit

Arrow keys moves you and Z pulls tiles.

F1 = changes resolution.
F2 = Turns off retro shader.
F4 = Fullscreen.

Made in GameMaker 1.4.

Font is PixelsRUs by castpixel
